column2: Outfit in the name of Diety
This character thinks Dazbog is the greatest slavic god.
This character thinks Jarilo is the greatest slavic god.
This character thinks Lada is the greatest slavic goddess.
This character thinks Perun is the greatest slavic god.
This character thinks Odin is the greatest norse god.
This character thinks Thor is the greatest norse god.
This character thinks Freyja is the greatest norse god.
This character thinks Loki is the greatest norse god.
This character thinks Ukko is the greatest suomenusko god.
This character thinks Akka is the greatest suomenusko god.
This character thinks Nyyrikki is the greatest suomenusko god.
This character thinks Sappo Ilmarinen is the greatest suomenusko god.
This character thinks Dietas is the greatest romuva god.
This character thinks Perkunas is the greatest romuva god.
This character thinks Laima is the greatest romuva god.
This character thinks Zemyna is the greatest romuva god.
